language.tooltip: Select the interface language. This affects all text in the application.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Select the visual style of the application
theme.tooltip: Choose between Modern (colorful, rounded) or Terminal (retro, green-on-black) visual style.

streaming.label: Streaming
streaming.description: Enable streaming for real-time responses or wait for complete messages

response.label: Model response
response.description: Choose how the model delivers responses
response.tooltip: Stream: See words appear in real-time as the model generates them. Complete: Wait for the full response before displaying. Streaming provides better UX but uses more resources.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.tooltip: Controls randomness in responses. 0.0 = deterministic and focused, 0.7 = balanced (recommended), 1.0+ = creative but less predictable. Higher values slow down generation.

topP.label: Top P
topP.tooltip: Limits token choices by cumulative probability. 0.9 (recommended) = consider top 90% likely tokens. Lower = more focused/repetitive, higher = more diverse. Values below 0.5 or above 0.95 can degrade quality.

topK.label: Top K
topK.tooltip: Limits choices to K most likely tokens. 40 (recommended) = balanced. 1-20 = very focused/repetitive, 60-100 = more diverse. Very high values (>80) can include unlikely tokens and slow generation.
